vision.notes: Likely present, but details unknown. Further research needed to determine visual acuity, spectral sensitivity, and other aspects of vision in Raphidiidae.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely present for basic environmental awareness, but details regarding specialized mechanosensory organs are unknown. Requires further investigation.

chemoreception.notes: Likely plays a role in finding food and mates, but specifics of receptors and targeted compounds are not known. Further research required.
